feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.1.0
entry.content:
We are excited to announce the release of Formbricks 3.1.0 üî•

This release introduces advanced white-labeling options for Formbricks, enhanced survey customization features, support for question recall within the redirect ending card and numerous bug fixes, along with performance and security improvements.

Thanks to all the contributors who help make Formbricks more robust and performant. üí™üôè

Please make sure to to check out the migration guide before upgrading ü§ì

What's Changed

  • feat: Placeholder input for contact and address question by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4549
  • feat: added turnstile to signup flow by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4516
  • feat: whitelabel 2 | Email customization by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4546
  • fix: MUI warnings in logic editor by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4521
  • fix: adds cached service for getting contact with attributes by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4598
  • fix: adds vercel style guide to @formbricks/js-core by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4520
  • fix: ai feature check by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4597
  • fix: back button by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4513
  • fix: code scanning alert no. 36: Incomplete URL substring sanitization by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4577
  • fix: console error in recontact card settings by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4519
  • fix: contacts page layout remount by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4588
  • fix: contacts upload ui issues by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4559
  • fix: docs typo by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4581
  • fix: email smtp auth mode by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4571
  • fix: embed modal preview by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4548
  • fix: exhausting connection limit on survey summary by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4562
  • fix: fixes docs for migration guide by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4536
  • fix: improves attributes route performance by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4547
  • fix: make getSummary response call synchronous to avoid db issues by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4564
  • fix: multi-select component by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4529
  • fix: name in sso signup by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4587
  • fix: new ending card not expanding by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4526
  • fix: notion issue with empty url by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4517
  • fix: pnpm install error in lib package by @Justman100 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4537
  • fix: progress bar by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4589
  • fix: recall dropoff bug by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4596
  • fix: recontactDays calculation by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4590
  • fix: refactors react native client by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4527
  • fix: remove default values for new questions added by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4450
  • fix: removed logo from survey loading if branding is disabled by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4542
  • fix: single use card text filling error by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4514
  • fix: survey timeout during routing by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4515
  • fix: tweak responsiveness of mobile surveys by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4580
  • fix: urls in email footer by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4507
  • fix: user delete bug by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4550
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 4 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4552
  • chore: add github action for sonarQube by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4551
  • chore: add testing infra to apps/web by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4563
  • chore: adds vercel style guide linting in demo app by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4557
  • chore: adds vercel style guide to docs app by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4561
  • chore: make ai feature available for self hosting by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4543
  • chore: moved insights model to database package by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4575
  • chore: optimisations in survey summary by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4592
  • chore: prepare 3.1 release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4603
  • chore: refactors question form input by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4567
  • chore: remove unused code from FormbricksClient by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4565
  • chore: run sonarqube manually by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4560
  • chore: tweaked survey card animation by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4518
  • chore: update upload-artifact to v4 by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4568
  • chore: vercel style guide for main app (2) by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4525
  • chore: vercel style guide part 3 by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4530
  • docs: add notes to integrations by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4544

New Contributors

  • @Justman100 made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4537

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: API key types by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4610
  • fix: overlapping UI and translations by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4615
  • fix: colour picker by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4619
  • fix: column ordering by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4621
  • fix: Change type Single / Multi select to Ranking should not remove o‚Ä¶ by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4622
  • fix: recall to ending card button url by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4627
  • chore: permissions to workflows by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4599

New Contributors

  • @Paribesh01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4619

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.1.0...v3.1.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps-dev): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 9 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4639
  • fix: created at mapping in notion integration by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4640
  • fix: cmd + enter to jump to next question by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4626
  • chore: added playwright cloud to gh workflow by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4556
  • fix: Increase response limit by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4650
  • fix: onboarding organization creation bug by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4641
  • chore: increase version number to 3.1.2 by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4658
  • fix: e2e test by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4660
  • fix: prevent duplicate value appending in docker-compose.yml by @Chromico in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4618
  • docs: rate limiting docs by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4652
  • chore: fix openAPI specs throw error by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4662

New Contributors

  • @Chromico made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4618

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.1.1...v3.1.2

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: adds webhook types by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4606
  • fix: long answer in Slack integration by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4654
  • fix: added link to notion doc by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4670
  • test: unit test for auth module by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4612
  • fix: new contribution message action by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4661
  • fix: fixes formbricks.logout by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4672
  • chore: removed contact attributes from recall by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4651
  • chore: prepare 3.1.3 release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4682

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.1.2...v3.1.3

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: recall in follow up by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4680
  • chore(cloud): move from customer-io to brevo by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4681
  • fix: email inconsistencies by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4678
  • fix: org leaving issue and minor tweaks by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4691
  • chore: invite types by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4613
  • fix: open file in new tab by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4697
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 2 directories with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4686
  • fix(client-api): apis openapi spec by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4706
  • fix: line height in description by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4687
  • feat: test-coverage by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4701
  • fix: userError by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4703
  • fix: what_is_a_pannel_answer text key missing by @kart1ka in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4679
  • fix: docker corepack issues by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4709

New Contributors

  • @kart1ka made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4679

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.1.3...v3.1.4
